title: G4MF Mesh Deformation Blend Shape Morph Target
description: The indices of which items this blend shape morph target applies to, and how much displacement should be applied to each of those items.

indices.description: The index of the accessor that contains the indices for the mesh deformation blend shape morph target.

offsets.description: The index of the accessor that contains the offsets or displacements for the mesh deformation blend shape morph target.
